bug.author: HenrySiau
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/metrics>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/metrics</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
the link to the source code links to 404 page Defined in python/keras/api/_v2/keras/metrics/__init__.py. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/metrics.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/metrics.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
no

comments.comment: The webpage has been updated and all links are working now. Thanks!
